8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri narrated that:the Messenger of Allah said: "Three things do not break the fast of the fasting person: Cupping, vomiting, and the wet dream

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّائِمِ يَذْرَعُهُ الْقَىْءُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Fasting Person Who Is Overcome By Vomiting
